content: This Stealth Project was later named the Green Project when James Gosling and Mike Sheridan joined Patrick.[1] As the Green Project teethed, the prospects of the project started becoming clearer to the engineers working on it. No longer did it aim to create a new language far superior to the present ones, but it aimed to target devices other than the computer.
stemmed: thi stealth project later name green project jame gosl mike sheridan join patrick . [ 1 ] As green project teeth , prospect project start becom clearer engin work . No longer aim creat new languag far superior present one , aim target devic comput .
